name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Senior PowerBI Engineer with over 13 years of full-stack development experience specializing in data visualization and analytics. Expert in **PowerBI**, **DAX**, **Power Query**, and **Dataflows**, with a strong foundation in **SQL Server** for robust data modeling and architecture. Proven proficiency in **Azure** cloud services and ETL processes, ensuring high-quality data integration and transformation for informed decision-making.
Skilled in creating and managing APIs to facilitate seamless data flow and enhancing data quality through effective data governance practices. Excellent communication skills, enabling collaboration across cross-functional teams to deliver insightful business intelligence solutions. Additionally, adept in **JavaScript/TypeScript**, **Python**, and leading frameworks such as **React**, **Next.js**, and **Node.js**, with hands-on experience in crafting high-performance applications within the healthcare and financial sectors. Familiar with compliance-driven development adhering to HIPAA, FHIR, PCI DSS, and SOC 2 standards.

experience.responsibilities:
Designed and developed data architecture and modeling strategies utilizing **SQL Server** to support PowerBI reporting and analytics, ensuring data quality and integrity across multiple sources.
Implemented **ETL** processes and optimized dataflows, utilizing **Power Query** to transform and load data effectively into **PowerBI**, maximizing report performance and user accessibility.
Built interactive dashboards and reports in **PowerBI** utilizing **DAX** for complex calculations, emphasizing usability and actionable insights.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to refine data communication strategies, enhancing information exchange through **APIs** and documentation.
Regularly conducted data quality assessments and audits to ensure compliance with organizational standards and best practices, leading to a **25%** increase in data reliability.
Developed and maintained data models, ensuring scalability and responsiveness in line with business needs, resulting in a **30%** faster report generation time.
Leveraged **Azure** cloud services for scalable solutions to manage data storage and processing, enhancing deployment efficiency and reducing operational costs by **15%**.
Trained stakeholders on using **PowerBI** tools, increasing team proficiency and reducing dependency on technical support.
Integrated **Excel** functionalities to enable advanced analytics and reporting, streamlining workflows and improving decision-making processes across departments.

Utilized **Power BI** in conjunction with **DAX** and **Power Query** to create dynamic financial dashboards and reports that deliver actionable insights, improving data-driven decision-making by **30%**.
Designed and implemented **data architecture** strategies, ensuring high scalability and performance of ETL processes to handle over **5 million** transactions daily using **Azure Data Factory**.
Developed and maintained robust **SQL Server** databases, focused on optimizing queries for data retrieval and ensuring data quality across financial reports.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to establish **APIs** for seamless data integration and workflow automation, enhancing operational efficiency by **25%**.
Executed comprehensive data modeling initiatives to classify and structure financial data, supporting analysis and visualization efforts with **Power BI** and improving reporting accuracy by **15%**.
Initiated and conducted **dataflows** for automated data ingestion processes, reducing manual input and errors while streamlining reporting timelines by **40%**.
Led communication efforts within the team to align on best practices for data quality checks and standards, contributing to a **50%** increase in stakeholder satisfaction surveys regarding data reliability.

Utilized **PowerBI** to create interactive dashboards and reports, transforming complex datasets into actionable insights for stakeholders across the organization, enhancing decision-making and operational efficiency.
Employed **DAX** for advanced calculations and data analysis to develop robust data models that ensure high data quality and integrity in reports and dashboards.
Developed and optimized **Power Query** processes for ETL workflows, streamlining data ingestion from various sources including **SQL Server**, and ensuring timely updates of essential business metrics.
Implemented extensive **data architecture** strategies enabling seamless dataflows between systems, enhancing data accessibility and reporting capabilities for teams.
Designed efficient **data modeling** techniques to support performance analysis and trend reporting, which resulted in a **25%** increase in analysis speed and user engagement with the datasets.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to understand data requirements and foster clear communication, ensuring alignment on data-related objectives and deliverables.
Leveraged **Azure** for data storage solutions, resulting in enhanced scalability and better resource management in the reporting pipeline.
Reengineered APIs to facilitate the integration of external data sources with PowerBI, improving data accuracy and timeliness of reports.
Executed regular data quality assessments and data cleansing workflows ensuring all data presented in PowerBI dashboards is reliable and precise, achieving a **98%** accuracy rate.
Provided training and support to team members on PowerBI best practices, significantly increasing platform adoption across the organization.
